```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)

mlb <- read_csv("mlb_elo.csv")

teams <- as_tibble(unique(mlb$team1))

win_loss <- function(x) {
  team <- names(x)
  if (team == team1) {
    mutate(win = 1)
  } else {
    mutate(win = 0)
  }
}

for (team in teams){
  filter(mlb$team1 == team)
}
```
